sentence.Network_en: These institutions have made the assertion of ethnic identity possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些制度使实现民族认同的主张成为可能。

sentence.Network_en: Self-assertion was not thought seemly in a woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们认为女性不应该过于自信。

sentence.Network_en: He was correct in his assertion that the minister had been lying.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认定部长说谎，事实果然如此。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin assertio(n-), from the verb asserere (see assert)

entry.def: If someone asserts a fact or belief, they state it firmly.

example.ex: Mr. Helm plans to assert that the bill violates the First Amendment...
example.tran: 赫尔姆先生打算声明该法案违反了宪法第一修正案。

example.ex: The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal...
example.tran: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

entry.def: If you assert your authority, you make it clear by your behaviour that you have authority.

example.ex: After the war, the army made an attempt to assert its authority in the south of the country...
example.tran: 战后，军队试图在该国的南部地区维护其统治地位。

example.ex: The people have asserted their power and that will be very difficult to reverse.
example.tran: 人民已经维护了其当家作主的权力，这将难以改变。

entry.def: If you assert your right or claim to something, you insist that you have the right to it.

example.ex: The republics began asserting their right to govern themselves.
example.tran: 各加盟共和国开始要求获得自治权。

entry.tran: 坚持（自己）的主张;表现坚定
entry.def: If you assert yourself, you speak and act in a forceful way, so that people take notice of you.

example.ex: He's speaking up and asserting himself confidently.
example.tran: 他明确表态，信心十足地阐述自己的观点。

means.word_mean: 1. a declaration that is made emphatically (as if no supporting evidence were necessary)
2. the act of affirming or asserting or stating something

auth_sentence.content: Or, perhaps, one that disputes that assertion?
auth_sentence.res_content: Or, perhaps, one that disputes that assertion?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or, perhaps, one that disputes that assertion?

auth_sentence.content: But Chief Justice Roberts didn't accept that assertion.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Chief Justice Roberts didn't accept that assertion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Chief Justice Roberts didn't accept that assertion.

auth_sentence.content: I make this sweeping assertion on the basis of...experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: I make this sweeping assertion on the basis of...experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I make this sweeping assertion on the basis of...experience.

sentences.en: The assertion of the right to freedom is very important to all peoples.
sentences.cn: 维护自由权利对各民族来说都是至关重要的。

sentences.en: He made an assertion that he was not responsible for it.
sentences.cn: 他硬说, 他对此事没有责任。

sentences.en: material misstatement risks at the assertion level
sentences.cn: 认定层次的重大错报风险
